| HistoryText             = The Gun Nuns was a group led by [[Mother Superior (Gun Nuns) (Earth-616)|Mother Superior]] tasked by [[Yahweh (Earth-616)|God]] with the mission of guarding the gateway to [[Heaven (Paradise)|Heaven]].{{r|Ghost Riders: Heaven's on Fire Vol 1 3}}

All of them, with the exception of Mother Superior, were killed during their confrontation against [[Zadkiel (Earth-616)|Zadkiel]]'s [[Ghost Rider Assassination League (Earth-616)|Ghost Rider Assassination League]].{{r|Ghost Riders: Heaven's on Fire Vol 1 4|5}}
